snippet: The marine, Sgt. Alexander Blackman, and two others were charged after military authorities found footage of the episode on a helmet camera belonging to one of the men.
abstract: Sgt Alexander Blackman, British Royal Marine convicted of murdering wounded Taliban insurgent in Afghanistan in 2011, is sentenced to minimum of 10 years in prison.
lead_paragraph: The marine, Sgt. Alexander Blackman, and two others were charged after military authorities found footage of the episode on a helmet camera belonging to one of the men.

headline.main: Britain: Royal Marine Sentenced for Killing an Afghan Insurgent
headline.print_headline: Britain: Royal Marine Sentenced For Killing an Afghan Insurgent
